channel.title: GitHub Blade Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Blade in GitHub

item.title: laravel/laravel
item.description: Laravel is a web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax. We’ve already laid the foundation for your next big idea — freeing you to create without sweating the small things.

item.title: FahimAnzamDip/triangle-pos
item.description: Triangle POS is an open source Inventory Management with POS System. Developed with Laravel 10, Bootstrap 4 & Livewire 3. It's completely free to use.

item.title: lsky-org/lsky-pro
item.description: ☁️兰空图床(Lsky Pro) - Your photo album on the cloud.
